name: GGJ21 - Shoot to Freeze
description:
You're lost in hellish cave, with a cursed reflex camera that can stop the time of what you shoot (even yourself!) Find the right moment and survive each trap, try to become the best cave dweller! (leaderboard at the end)

The controls are your typical "WASD" but you can also jump with "spacebar"

And with your left mouse button you shoot with and freeze what you're aiming (also yourself! Remember it as you might need it *wink*laser room*wink*)

This game was developed during the 2021 Global Game Jam by:
Fabio (Jimmythepage) Corrirossi
Joel Fallerini
